questions.question_text: What do you click when you have made modifications to your report, and you want to see the results without saving?

discussion.content:
C. Run 
Run the report and it displays the information based on the updates made.

Selected Answer: C
Definitely "C". You Run the report and it displays the information based on the updates made.

questions.question_text: Which framework can automatically populate values for the Priority and Category fields based on the Short description field value?

A. Predictive Intelligence

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-intelligent-experiences/page/administer/predictive-intelligence/concept/using-predictive-intelligence.html
Not UI Action?

Correct answer is A:
The Predictive Intelligence classification framework enables you to use machine-learning algorithms to set field values during record creation, such as setting the incident category based on the short description.

Selected Answer: A
Correct answer is A.
 For example, when an incident is created, ServiceNow will automatically assign the correct category, priority and assignment group based on the record's short description. 
Assignment rules: The instance can automatically assign a task to a user or group based on pre-defined conditions by using data lookup rules and assignment rules.

questions.question_text: Which testing framework is used to test ServiceNow Applications?
Which allows the creation of a task-based record from Service Catalog?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D - to create a task record (INC, CHG, etc) from the Service Catalog you use a Record Producer

D is correct
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-servicenow-platform/page/product/service-catalog-management/concept/c_RecordProducer.html
